forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 6C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High near 45F. ESE winds shifting to SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow this evening transitioning to snow showers overnight. Low near 0C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 100%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow this evening transitioning to snow showers overnight. Low 34F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 100%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and snow. High 41F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow in the evening will transition to snow showers overnight. Low -2C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 80%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow in the evening will transition to snow showers overnight. Low near 30F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 80%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Periods of snow. Thunder possible. High 38F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 70%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low 29F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low 33F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 39F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 42F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Rain and snow showers in the morning. A few rain showers in the afternoon. High around 5C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning. A shower or two in the afternoon - otherwise, mostly cloudy. High 44F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed mostly cloudy skies and a few snow showers later at night. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed mostly cloudy skies and a few snow showers later at night. Low 34F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.
